sentences.en: “a fluid . . . production in which author, director, designer and cast seem to be working on the same wavelength”(&b{James Lardner})
sentences.cn: “一部作者、导演、设计人员和演员似乎完全协调一致的流畅作品”(&b{詹姆斯·拉德纳})

sentences.en: Because of their short wavelength, x - rays can pass through objects which are opaque to ordinary light.
sentences.cn: 由于 X 射线的波长短, 它就能穿透一般光线所不能穿透的物体.

sentences.en: Blue light has a shorter wavelength than red.
sentences.cn: 蓝光的波长比红光的短。

sentences.en: It's great to work with people who are on the same wavelength.
sentences.cn: 与志同道合的人一起工作真是太棒了。

sentences.en: Radio One has broadcast on this wavelength for years.
sentences.cn: 广播1台已经用这个波长广播多年了.

sentences.en: She found the wavelength of their broadcasts, and left the radio tuned to their station.
sentences.cn: 她找到了他们的广播波段，把收音机调到那个位置收听他们电台的节目。

sentences.en: So the researchers tried staining the tissue, and altering the wavelength of the laser light.
sentences.cn: 因此,研究人员试着给细胞组织着色, 并且改变激光波长.

sentences.en: Such wave fronts are seperated from one another by one - half wavelength.
sentences.cn: 这种波阵面彼此间隔半个波长.

sentences.en: Sunlight consists of different wavelengths of radiation.
sentences.cn: 阳光由波长不同的射线组成。

sentences.en: The absorption coefficient is often strongly wavelength - dependent.
sentences.cn: 吸收系数往往与波长密切相关.

sentences.en: The authorities were unable to jam this wavelength.
sentences.cn: 当局无法干扰这一波长.

sentences.en: The energy of the photon gives its color, or wavelength.
sentences.cn: 光子的能量决定了光子的颜色, 也就决定了它的波长.

sentences.en: The opacity is a function of temperature and wavelength.
sentences.cn: 暗度是温度与波长的函数.

sentences.en: The'smoothness " of a metal surface depends on the wavelength of the radiation.
sentences.cn: 金属表面的 “ 光洁度 ” 与电磁辐射的波长有关.

sentences.en: This will also change according to the wavelength of the laser light.
sentences.cn: 但这也会随着激光波长的改变而改变.

sentences.en: Wave speed equals frequency times wavelength.
sentences.cn: 波速等于频率乘以波长.

sentences.en: We're not on the same wavelength.
sentences.cn: 我们对事情的看法不一样.
